text: NGC 437 is a lenticular galaxy of type S0/a located in the constellation Pisces. It was discovered on October 22, 1886 by Lewis Swift. It was described by Dreyer as "pretty faint, very small, round, faint star to northwest." ==References== ==External links== * 0437 18861022 Category:Pisces (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies Category:Discoveries by Lewis Swift
title: NGC 437
